title: PowerNotes
text: is a research tool that enables students to develop research outlines as they gather information. It can be used as a browser extension for better organization and efficiency.

features.title: Multimedia integration
features.text: Harmonize allows users to incorporate multimedia elements such as images, videos, and links into their discussions. This feature enhances the richness of the conversations and supports a more engaging and dynamic learning environment.

features.title: Real-time collaboration
features.text: The platform supports real-time collaboration, enabling users to participate in discussions and interact with peers in a synchronous manner. This can foster more immediate and interactive exchanges of ideas among students and educators.

features.title: Analytics and insights
features.text: Harmonize provides analytics and insights into user engagement and participation. This feature allows educators to track the progress of discussions, identify trends, and assess the level of student involvement. Analytics can be valuable for instructors in understanding the effectiveness of discussions and making data-driven decisions.
